summary.para: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ typography functionality.

remarks.para: Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace. The classes in this namespace allow users to create and use collections of fonts.

block.para: Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
